functional_areas.name: Service Planning & Scheduling
functional_areas.description: Covers the design of transit routes and schedules, using data-driven methods to optimize service for demand and efficiency. Includes timetabling, blocking, runcutting, and GTFS data publishing. Modern systems integrate GIS, equity metrics, and digital planning tools.

functional_areas.name: Operations Management (Real-Time)
functional_areas.description: Encompasses day-to-day oversight of vehicle movements, schedule adherence, detours, and emergency response. Involves CAD/AVL systems, dispatch consoles, and performance dashboards used in the control center.

functional_areas.name: Fare Collection & Revenue Management
functional_areas.description: Manages how fares are paid, validated, and processed. Supports fare media, validators, contactless payment, account-based systems, and backend reconciliation across all channels and partners.

functional_areas.name: Asset Management & Maintenance
functional_areas.description: Tracks the full lifecycle of vehicles, equipment, and facilities, including preventive maintenance, work orders, inspections, and FTA TAM compliance. Integrates with inventory and capital planning.

functional_areas.name: Safety, Security & Incident Management
functional_areas.description: Ensures rider and employee safety through proactive hazard management, incident logging, emergency response planning, and oversight of physical and cybersecurity infrastructure.

functional_areas.name: Workforce Management & Human Resources
functional_areas.description: Covers operator scheduling, timekeeping, payroll, labor compliance, training, certification tracking, and HR information systems. Integrates with run-cutting and workforce availability tools.

functional_areas.name: Performance Analytics & Reporting
functional_areas.description: Supports KPI tracking, dashboards, service productivity analysis, NTD submissions, and public transparency. Leverages data pipelines and warehousing to support planning and operations teams.

functional_areas.name: Data Infrastructure & Systems Integration
functional_areas.description: Enables interoperability across applications and vendors using APIs, microservices, cloud hosting, and integration middleware. Supports GTFS, GTFS-RT, data validation, and system-level architecture.

functional_areas.name: Regulatory Compliance & Policy
functional_areas.description: Manages adherence to ADA, Title VI, environmental, and federal grant reporting requirements. Supports internal reviews and external audits to maintain public funding and legal compliance.

functional_areas.name: On-Demand Mobility & MaaS
functional_areas.description: Provides demand-responsive services (paratransit, microtransit) and integration with other mobility providers. Enables multimodal trip planning, booking, and payment through partner APIs.

functional_areas.name: Facilities, Stations & Curbside Management
functional_areas.description: Oversees infrastructure at bus stops, stations, and layover points. Covers signage, amenities, real-time displays, shelter maintenance, and policy coordination for street and curbside access.

functional_areas.name: Cybersecurity
functional_areas.description: Protects digital infrastructure including IT and OT systems, fare systems, and rider data. Includes access control, network segmentation, security audits, and incident response protocols.

functional_areas.name: Climate Resilience & Environmental Management
functional_areas.description: Plans for climate impacts, sustainability initiatives, emissions reduction, and disaster preparedness. Tracks compliance with environmental mandates and supports long-term adaptation strategies.

functional_areas.name: Financial Management & Procurement
functional_areas.description: Handles accounting, budgeting, capital programs, grant oversight, and procurement processes. Integrates with ERP systems and ensures transparency, auditability, and cost control.

functional_areas.name: Customer Experience & Information Services
functional_areas.description: Supports real-time passenger information, trip planning tools, mobile apps, service alerts, marketing, and customer feedback systems. Aims to build trust, ease of use, and rider retention.
